items.name: MacBook Pro 14-inch
items.description: Professional-grade laptop featuring Apple's M-series chip, stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 18 hours of battery life. Perfect for creative professionals and power users.

items.name: iPhone 16 Pro
items.description: Latest flagship iPhone with ProMotion display, advanced camera system, and powerful A-series chip. Features improved photography capabilities and enhanced AR experiences.

items.name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Headphones
items.description: Premium wireless noise-cancelling headphones with industry-leading sound quality, touch controls, and up to 30 hours of battery life. Includes multipoint pairing and speak-to-chat technology.

items.name: Sonos Five Speaker
items.description: High-fidelity smart speaker with rich, room-filling sound. Features humidity resistance, stereo pairing capability, and seamless multi-room audio integration.

items.name: Dell XPS 15 Laptop
items.description: Premium Windows laptop with InfinityEdge display, powerful Intel processor, and NVIDIA graphics. Ideal for content creation and professional work with its stunning 4K display option.

items.name: AirPods Pro
items.description: Advanced wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and spatial audio. Features customizable fit, sweat resistance, and seamless integration with Apple devices.

items.name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
items.description: Premium Android smartphone with S Pen support, advanced camera system with 200MP main sensor, and AI-powered features. Includes a large AMOLED display and all-day battery life.
